resources.string: The system is busy, please try again later

"Please turn on the switch in the upper right corner and enjoy the following functions to enhance your experience.
【Accelerate Mobile Phone】Turn off programs that are not often used in the background and speed up mobile phones
【Clean up garbage】Clean up the garbage during the use of mobile phones and release more space
Tips：When the auxiliary function is turned on, the system may pop up a warning，According to the User Privacy Agreement, we will not collect any privacy information from you. Please feel free to use it."
